name: Migi Osu
description:
Press right and edge towards the end of the cliff without falling off, then pass the controller to the next player. Whoever pushed Migi-Kun off the cliff is eliminated. Party game for 2-8 players.

Select Players by pressing left or right while highlighting start game in main menu

Controls (Xbox Controller/Keyboard):

Movement: Left Analogue Stick / Arrow Keys or WASD

Accept Turn/Select option: A button / Space or Enter

This game was created by Alex Rose of Super Rude Bear Resurrection, Nathan John and Daniel Murdoch of Standpoint, newcomer artist Gaby Wilde and Joel Strange of I want to be human, at Multiplay's Insomnia53 Festival.

Best sampled with an Xbox Controller, otherwise use D to move and Space to accept.
